meaningMnemonic: The <radical>sheep</radical> radical and the <kanji>sheep</kanji> kanji are the same in looks as well in meaning.
readingMnemonic: To remember よう, we use the word "Yogurt." The <kanji>sheep</kanji> are after you. There are too many of them, and they're chasing you down, stalking you... because you stole their sheep's milk <reading>yo</reading>gurt (よう). Now you're running and crying and trying to eat the yogurt before the sheep catch up and stomp you down with their hooves.
